It's=
 too bad you didn't get more participation.=A0 I'd be happy to be part of t=
he second test too.

One thing I'd suggest: remove any question(s) that you=
 are asking, from the audio file.=A0 Since you're trying to study how diffe=
rent people will interpret the same file, and are trying not to give any hi=
nts as to what other people hear in the file, leaving the question in could=
 be a factor there.=A0 For example, if you are asking a yes/no question in =
the audio, then the people listening might be inclined to restrict their an=
swers to having heard a "yes" or a "no" (because the question implies that =
is what may follow).=A0 But by leaving the question out, you remove any hin=
ts as to what they should expect.

<TD vAlign=top><BR>It's too bad you didn't get more participation.  I'd be happy to be part of the second test too.<BR><BR>One thing I'd suggest: remove any question(s) that you are asking, from the audio file.  Since you're trying to study how different people will interpret the same file, and are trying not to give any hints as to what other people hear in the file, leaving the question in could be a factor there.  For example, if you are asking a yes/no question in the audio, then the people listening might be inclined to restrict their answers to having heard a "yes" or a "no" (because the question implies that is what may follow).  But by leaving the question out, you remove any hints as to what they should expect.<BR><BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 1/23/09, nightparanormalrese arch <I><nightparanormalrese arch@yahoo. com></I></B> wrote:<BR>

 <BR>someone has a question on a post for me depending on what day it is <BR>you may have to wait till fri or sat. <BR>I just wanted to put that out ther so noone thinks Iam ignoring <BR>them or not answering emails. <BR>Now back to the test I will send out the new file to all those who <BR>participated in the last one and any one who would also like to <BR>participate let me know via email <A rel=nofollow>nightparanormalrese arch@yahoo. com</A><BR>and i will gladly send it to you.If you participated on the last one <BR>but dont want to on this one just ignore the email ill be sending.<BR>Thank you to all those who have taken the time to listen to the <BR>first one and I truly apoligize that it was a bust but I think this <BR>one will be alot better as I have mor time to spend and i wont be <BR>rushing.<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
